Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_nh0d6mzbJA1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/ornJELGhk_M" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p><span>A Kerbal stationed on Eve makes one big wish. Will it come true? Find out in <a href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq15ZM3jpoKrzEiJJJmmNVw"><strong>One Way Gaming</strong></a>'s “Christmas: Eve.”</span></p>

The feels! They hurt so much!

Merry Christmas!

Ahh, Jeb is happy now. But I've never sent a kerbal to eve, ever.

The thought of a kerbal being trapped on eve for the rest of his life!

Hey, for all who like KSP Christmas videos, I made one too ;-)

You can download the crafts used in the video aswell.

Merry Christmas

How the- what the- who the- How did this happen?!! My god!!! Thanks a billion Kagillion Squad!!! This truly made this Christmas a Christmas for me to remember. I'm so glad that I'm getting a Hard Drive and a CPU fan this Christmas. I'm going to need it for a Linux install! I'll do my best to keep up the quality! You guys are Saints!! Merry Christmas everyone!! MERRY CHRISTMAS AND A HAPPY NEW YEAR TO ALL!!!! AND TO ALL A GOOD NIGHT!!!! WHOO!!

. How can I NOT give rep to that! And to your computer hardware, I'm planning on buying a new PC this Christmas too! If you ever want to make any videos with me (or me make a video with you), I'd be more than happy to help out. Merry Christmas!!!!!

*sigh* Well Xacktar, I guess my pet snail is about to die. *loads gun* *quickscopes pet snail* *snail dodges bullet and runs away* WAAAA

But seriously, merry Christmas everyone!

This took too long to admit

Ahh, Jeb is happy now. But I've never sent a kerbal to eve, ever.

The thought of a kerbal being trapped on eve for the rest of his life!

Choose one who wants to go. A brave, kebal hero. (Or, maybe just a recluse)

Also, this is a great video. Well made, and each bit contributes- a lot of these cinematic type things contain a lot of big showy shots which are just for show- which seems a little wasteful.

And also, once again:

Edited December 25, 2014 by Tw1

Congratz One-Way Gaming!

I said it before, and I'll say it again; That is a great video!

Merry Christmas!
Thanks Xacktar! Merry Christmas to you too!
